pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Urho3D is a game engine for 2D and 3D games with scripting abilities.
It supports AngelScript, Lua, C++ to script games.
It allows to export WebAssembly (WASM) web browser games though Emscripten.
It supports realistic physics with Bullet and Box2D.
URHO3D_RPI_CONFIG and URHO3D_ANDROID_CONFIG may be set as a per-package environmental variable to tune the configure stage for android and rpi builds.
Example: URHO3D_RPI_CONFIG=( -DRPI_ABI=armeabi-v7a ) URHO3D_ANDROID_CONFIG=( -DANDROID_ABI=armeabi-v7a )
